## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [hrq1-1 rad5A-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Significant hypersensitivity against cisplatin and MMC.
   - [rad5A-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Strong sensitivity against both cisplatin and MMC.
